data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Śląskie that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Śląskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Śląskie, Poland who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Śląskie, Poland.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Śląskie, Poland by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Śląskie, Poland.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Polish-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Śląskie, Poland.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Śląskie to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.section_summary:
the state of Śląskie, Poland has a population of 4,640,700.

We estimate Śląskie has 14,400 people who might know Jesus, 4,138,711 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 487,589 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 322 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Śląskie, Poland know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
